nodes.bodyText: imo these don't need an ID suffix

return location.getRegionID() == AGILITY_ARENA_REGION_ID;
Preference, I suppose.
Would there be any reason to want your gauntlet untradeables screenshotted, ie should this be configurable?

No as EVERY single item dropped by them is untradeable and generates a screenshot for EACH item/item stack. I killed ONE npc and got 3 screenshots. You kill multiple every single run, therefore you start loading up on screenshots that are absolutely useless.
